20-041EC.summary: Recommendation to appoint nine Independent Redistricting Commission members randomly selected from the applicant subpool by the Ethics Commission Chair, subject to the completion of the remaining City requirements, and direct staff to advise the Mayor and elected officials of the Commission’s actions.Chair Wise declared a recess at 4:51 PM.Chair Wise called the meeting back to order at 5:01 PM.Chair Wise spoke.Commissioner Shotwell spoke.Chair Wise spoke.Jonathan Nagayama, City Clerk Analyst, spoke.A dialogue ensued between Chair Wise and Jonathan Nagayama, City Page 8 of 10TELECONFERENCE, 3:30 PMWEDNESDAY, OCTOBER 14, 2020CITY OF LONG BEACHETHICS COMMISSION MINUTESClerk Analyst.Commissioner Shotwell spoke.A motion was made by Commissioner Shotwell, seconded by Commissioner De Benedictis, to approve motion to conduct a random selection from the applicant subpool and appoint the randomly selected applicants CD1-21, CD2-38, CD3-11, CD4-17, CD5-14, CD6-11, CD7-19, CD8-20, and CD9-31 to the Independent Redistricting Commission.  The motion carried by the following vote:Yes: 7 - Lani De Benedictis, Luke Fiedler, Kimmy Maniquis, Barbara Pollack, J. P. Shotwell, Margo Morales and Susan WiseA motion was made by Vice Chair Morales, seconded by Commissioner Pollack, to approve motion to direct staff to advise the Mayor and elected officials of the Commission’s actions and include information regarding the selection process and the demographic information of the applicants selected.  The motion carried by the following vote:Yes: 7 - Lani De Benedictis, Luke Fiedler, Kimmy Maniquis, Barbara Pollack, J. P. Shotwell, Margo Morales and Susan Wise5.
